title: What was the biggest selling single of the 80s? - Quora

response.answer_text: If I were to had ventured a guess, I would have said something off of Michael Jackson's Thriller album. Instead, I researched the question and learned that the best selling single of the 1980s is a charity song by the group Band Aid entitled Do They Know It's Christmas. This song also became the best selling single of all time in the UK.
